components/cart/modals/configure-product:
{{lang 'cart.reconfigure_product' name=product_name}}

{{> components/common/alert-info}}
{{#each customizations}} {{{dynamicComponent 'components/products/customizations'}}} {{/each}} {{#each options}} {{{dynamicComponent 'components/products/options'}}} {{/each}}
components/common/alert-info: {{{this}}}
components/products/customizations/file:
{{#if original_name}} {{{lang 'products.file_option_set' url=file_url name=original_name}}} {{/if}}

{{#if file_size}}{{lang 'products.max_filesize'}} {{file_size}}, {{/if}}{{#if file_types}}{{lang 'products.filetypes'}} {{file_types}}{{/if}}
components/products/options/input-file:
{{#if original_name}} {{{lang 'products.file_option_set' url=file_url name=original_name}}} {{/if}}

{{#if file_size}}{{lang 'products.max_filesize'}} {{file_size}}, {{/if}}{{#if file_types}}{{lang 'products.filetypes'}} {{file_types}}{{/if}}
components/products/options/product-list:
{{#if values.0.image}}
    {{#unless required}}
    • {{/unless}} {{#each values}}
  • {{#if image}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{else}} {{#unless required}} {{/unless}} {{#each values}} {{/each}} {{/if}}
components/products/options/set-radio: {{#each this.values}} {{/each}}
components/products/options/set-rectangl: {{#each this.values}} {{/each}}
components/products/options/swatch: {{#each this.values}} {{/each}}
